subject: p12847817
Findings: Frontal radiographs of the chest demonstrate unchanged cardiomegaly. Lung volumes are low. There is pulmonary vascular congestion and moderate pulmonary edema increased from the prior. Bibasilar and retrocardiac opacities likely representing combination of pleural effusion and atelectasis with moderate to large pleural effusion on the right increased in size underlying consolidation cannot be excluded. Left vascular stent is unchanged.
